DDL.statement: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[APP_PACKING_LINES]( [PACKING_LINE_ID] [varchar](25) NOT NULL, [DESCRIPTION] [varchar](45) NULL, [ENABLED] [varchar](1) NULL ) ON [PRIMARY]

ALTER TABLE [dbo].[APP_PACKING_LINES] ADD PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [PACKING_LINE_ID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]

ALTER TABLE [dbo].[APP_PACKING_LINES] ADD DEFAULT ('Y') FOR [ENABLED]
